datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to brain functions, neural pathways, and cognitive research.

columns.name: degree_level
columns.description: Highest level of education degree obtained by the participant

columns.name: prefrontal_cortex_activity
columns.description: Level of activity in the prefrontal cortex during tasks

columns.name: occupation
columns.description: Occupation of the participant categorized into types such as student, professional, unemployed, etc.

columns.name: social_media_for_academia
columns.description: Average hours per week the participant uses social media to share or gather academic content

columns.name: participation_in_cognitive_research
columns.description: Number of cognitive research studies the participant has taken part in over the past year

columns.name: problem_solving_response_time
columns.description: Time taken to activate neural pathways during a problem-solving task (in milliseconds)

columns.name: memory_task_performance
columns.description: Score on standardized memory tasks, scaled between 0 and 10

columns.name: cognitive_games_frequency
columns.description: Number of times per week the participant engages in cognitive enhancing games

columns.name: education_level
columns.description: Highest education level achieved by the participant

columns.name: digital_resource_access
columns.description: Access level to digital resources like internet and educational software (scale 1-10)

columns.name: omega_3_intake_level
columns.description: Level of omega-3 fatty acids intake measured in grams per day

columns.name: hours_spent_on_cognitive_apps
columns.description: Number of hours per week the participant spends on apps designed for cognitive training

columns.name: smart_device_ownership
columns.description: Whether the participant owns a smart device such as a smartphone, tablet, or smartwatch

queries.question: What is the relationship between omega-3 intake levels, memory task performance, and prefrontal cortex activity in the neuroscience dataset provided?
